Text: LOL and downloading illegal torrents is okay with JC?

“Whatever you give is acceptable if you give it eagerly. And give according to what you have, not what you don’t have.” – 2 Corinthians 8:12, NLT

Remember, anything is justifiable if you live your life according to a collection of arbitrary and often contradictory fables. You just have to look hard enough and be willing to accept the ridiculous. Flame on!
